import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Landing = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

SafeReport

A Safe Space to Report Harassment and Get Support

We provide a confidential, secure platform for women to report harassment incidents, access support resources, and help create safer communities for everyone.

Get Started Learn More
Safe Community Illustration
{/* Features Section */}

How SafeReport Helps You

üõ°Ô∏è

Anonymous Reporting

Report incidents without revealing your identity. Your privacy is our priority.

üì±

Easy to Use

Simple, intuitive interface to report incidents quickly and efficiently.

üîí

Secure & Confidential

All data is encrypted and stored securely. Your information stays private.

üìä

Track Your Reports

Monitor the status of your reports and get updates on actions taken.

üß≠

Location Mapping

Identify harassment hotspots and help improve community safety.

ü§ù

Support Resources

Access to counselors, legal aid, and support organizations.

{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

1

Create Account

Sign up securely with your email

2

Report Incident

Submit details about the harassment incident

3

Get Support

Access resources and track your report status

4

Make Impact

Help create safer communities for everyone

{/* Statistics Section */}

Our Impact

1000+
Reports Handled
95%
User Satisfaction
24/7
Support Available
50+
Cities Covered
{/* Emergency Section */}

Need Immediate Help?

If you're in immediate danger, please contact emergency services first.

Police: 911
Women Helpline: 1-800-799-7233
Crisis Text Line: Text HOME to 741741
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Make a Difference?

Join thousands of women who are taking a stand against harassment and creating safer communities.

Start Reporting Safely

'1.5rem', fontWeight: 'bold', margin: '0 auto 1rem', }, stats: { padding: '4rem 0', backgroundColor: '#f8f9fa', }, statsGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, color: '#856404', fontWeight: '500', }, cta: { padding: '4rem 0', textAlign: 'center', backgroundColor: '#2c3e50', color: 'white', borderRadius: '10px', margin: '2rem 0', }, ctaTitle: { fontSize: '2.5rem', marginBottom: '1rem', fontWeight: '300', }, ctaText: { fontSize: '1.2rem', marginBottom: '2rem', opacity: '0.9', maxWidth: '600px', margin: '0 auto 2rem', }, ctaButton: { backgroundColor: '#007bff', color: 'white', padding: '15px 40px', borderRadius: '5px', textDecoration: 'none', fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize: '1.1rem', transition: 'background-color 0.3s', }, }; // Add hover effects const addHoverEffects = ` .featureCard:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); } .primaryButton:hover { background-color: #0056b3; } .secondaryButton:hover { background-color: #007bff; color: white; } .ctaButton:hover { background-color: #0056b3; } `; // Inject hover styles const styleSheet = document.styleSheets[0]; styleSheet.insertRule(addHoverEffects, styleSheet.cssRules.length); export default Landing;
